project-id.description: The project ID of the GCP project with the Vertex AI enabled. To find your project ID, visit the GCP console page.
project-id.title: Project ID

google-credential.description: The Google Cloud Platform credential JSON. To generate your credential, visit the GCP console page.
google-credential.title: Google Credential JSON

location.description: The location of the Vertex AI resources. For more information, check: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/locations
location.title: Location
